Perfect for business cards. See screenshot. â BeeTagg PriceCheck âScan product's Barcodes to get the best price.- Scan Books- Scan DVDs, CDs and Games- Scan Gadgets and Toys- Scan Beauty products- Scan Food- and more...BeeTagg PriceCheck is available everywhere but it works best in US, Canada, UK, Germany, France, Japan and Spain. â Features â - Scan pictures from your image gallery. - Supported contents for QR Code: vCard, MeCard, Text, SMS, eMail, Geo, Event. - Copy & Paste scanned content - and much more... Create your own codes. Visit http://www.beetagg.com

reviews.title: Super d duper
reviews.comment: Works really well. Better than others like it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more work.
reviews.comment: Has a difficult time reading VCard.  Will not save MeCard info to contact list.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works gr8 with Sony Ericsson arc s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: You lie!
reviews.comment: Why would you claim that the app can scan codes from pictures in the gallery when there is no such feature anywhere in the app? After 10 minutes of doing the same thing over and over again to make sure I wasn\'t crazy, I was just angry that you wasted my time. Also, why do I have a unique client ID and grant you access to lots of personal data? Hm..... No. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great but it doesn\'t work very well on computer barcodes, still it works great on HTC wildfire s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok, but needs improvement.
reviews.comment: It works just fine on 2d codes, but as for 1d, I\'m scanning stuff all over the house and it just keeps saying it can\'t find any info.
